snippet: The director of the Massachusetts Board of Pharmacy has been fired for failing to disclose a complaint against the pharmacy at the center of a meningitis outbreak, state officials said Wednesday.
abstract: Massachusetts officials say state Pharmacy Board director James Coffey was fired for failing to disclose complaint against New England Compounding Center, pharmacy at center of meningitis outbreak traced to a contaminated steroid drug.
lead_paragraph: The director of the Massachusetts Board of Pharmacy has been fired for failing to disclose a complaint against the pharmacy at the center of a meningitis outbreak, state officials said Wednesday.
